definitions.definition: The great circle on the celestial sphere that is the mean apparent path of the sun as viewed from the earth .
The plane in which this great circle lies.
A great circle drawn on a terrestrial globe , used for illustrating and solving astronomical problems.

main_definition: ( astronomy ) The great circle on the celestial sphere that is the mean apparent path of the sun as viewed from the earth .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) The plane in which this great circle lies.
( geometry ) A great circle drawn on a terrestrial globe , used for illustrating and solving astronomical problems.
